channel.title: [HELP] How To Change The Shop Value Of Items
channel.description: as title states..i searched forums but couldnt find anything :( i tried searching through all the files but didnt find anything related to shop value...Maybe i didnt look hard enough? not sure, anyway if you know how to can you please post...much appreciated

item.title: [HELP] How To Change The Shop Value Of Items
item.dc:creator: @Sick_of_Air Sick of Air
item.description:
@Sick_of_Air wrote:

…Wow… do you people know nothing about servers? It’s not in item.java nor in shops.cfg… It’s in item.cfg…

Chop, those aren’t the value, as you can see at the top, it shows the Item, then the ammount of that item in the shop… There’s no value there…

Owner Ethan, that pic you posted, those aren’t the prices, those are the item IDs, and the number after it is the ammount… And item.cfg changes the stats AND the prices…

Read full topic
item.source: [HELP] How To Change The Shop Value Of Items

item.title: [HELP] How To Change The Shop Value Of Items
item.dc:creator: @chop chop
item.description:
@chop wrote:

ok well i looked in both…this is from shops.cfg and the item.java has nothing to do with shop prices… lol so i have no idea where it is…maybe its in Item.cfg?

//-----ShopID---ShopName----------------------------------------Sell----Buy-----Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount shop = 1 @whi@Random Stuff 1 1 1931 5 1935 2 1735 2 1925 3 1923 2 1887 2 590 2 1755 2 2347 5 550 5 6070 20 4151 500 3842 500 3844 500 561 500 4675 500 391 5000 397 5000 385 5000 4153 500 3840 10000 2446 100 7336 1 293 1 6959 100 shop = 2 @red@Obsidian_Stuff@red@ 2 2 6522 10000
